about_the_game:
You are a fanfiction writer who gets kidnapped by aliens. But instead of being probed or experimented upon you are taken to a space station run by a mysterious rich backer who selects a single member of each known intelligent alien species to write more for them to read. You are the only human on a writer's retreat space station filled with different alien species.

In Galactic Love Utopia you will meet and get to know a bunch of intergalactic babes as you try to get used to living in this luxurious yet strange environment.

Gameplay

Galactic Love Utopia is a story focused visual novel with some dating simulator elements. Make choices and decide which part of the space station you want to explore by selecting a room to visit on the interactive map. Focus on improving your relationship with one or some of the main heroines, or visit a place where none of them tend to hang out for a scene with one of the side heroines.

Main heroines

Iroh, a shy woman from an alien species whose skin color changes depending on their emotions.

Kyta, an outgoing woman from an alien species made out of gas, who uses a female-looking clear suit to mingle with the rest of the space station's residents.

Sho (full name Shoukobuzu), a gentle woman from a plant-like species who will change appearance depending on the season.

Ando, a stoic robot woman from an artificially created "species".

Side heroines

Ai/Os, the space station's AI and your computer's holographic OS assistant.

Opia, a tall alien woman with four breasts.

Maaku, a brash and seductive demonic looking alien.

Shi, an alien woman with a large tail.

Qugera, an aquatic jellyfish alien woman.

Aimu, a galactic slime woman.

Ratek, a woman from an alien culture who hide their appearance/skin by wearing a body covering latex suit.

Gake, the mysterious owner/founder of the space station, a woman made out of a shadow-like substance.
